Package model.menu

Class MainMenu

java.lang.Object
model.menu.MainMenu
public class MainMenu extends Object
Main Menu class that has all the strings, values, and methods relating to the reservation system

    private static void
    findAndReserveRoom()
    This method essentially allows a user of the system to make a reservation, firstly it uses the readReservation method to read through the csv file that contains all the reservations and the stores all the reservations in the TreeMap reservationList Next the scanner is initialised and the scanner takes in all the inputs from the user and stores them in different classes and objects.

    Method that prints out the main menu
    static void
    run()
    This method prints out all the options for the main menu, it uses the scanner to take in inputs The exception prevents the user of the system to choose an option or index outside of the possible options the system has This method is used to run the entire reservation system and it connects everything together
    private static void
    seeMyReservation()
    This method allows the user to view their reservation details if they know their reservation.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public static void run()
      This method prints out all the options for the main menu, it uses the scanner to take in inputs The exception prevents the user of the system to choose an option or index outside of the possible options the system has This method is used to run the entire reservation system and it connects everything together

    • findAndReserveRoom

      private static void findAndReserveRoom() throws Exception
      This method essentially allows a user of the system to make a reservation, firstly it uses the readReservation method to read through the csv file that contains all the reservations and the stores all the reservations in the TreeMap reservationList Next the scanner is initialised and the scanner takes in all the inputs from the user and stores them in different classes and objects. The system is made in way that nearly every input is a number which is converted to data except details like first name etc. This method uses almost all the objects in the system At the end of the reservation process
      Throws:
      Exception

    • seeMyReservation

      private static void seeMyReservation()
      This method allows the user to view their reservation details if they know their reservation.

    • cancelReservation

      public static void cancelReservation()
      Hotel cancellation method: This removes a reservation from the list of csv reservations

    • hotelAnalysis

      public static void hotelAnalysis()
      This method uses the HotelAnalysis class and its' methods to analyse the hotels.
